entries.description: Fix issue where users are unable to login to Amazon Q if they have previously authenticated (#5214)
Fix incorrect text shown while updating documentation in /doc
Amazon Q Code Transformation: retry initial project upload on failure
/transform: use correct doc link in SQL conversion help message
Amazon Q /dev: Fix issue when files are deleted while preparing context
Amazon Q /test: Test generation fails for files outside the project
Amazon Q Code Transformation: allow PostgreSQL as target DB for SQL conversions
Fix incorrect accept and reject buttons shows up while hovering over the generated file
Prevent customization override if user has manually selected a customization
Align UX text of document generation flow with vs code version
